title: Can't create a discussion in alpha discussion board

embed.description: Waddup, alpha testers! A quick update: as previously announced, loot and clubs will hit the alpha during this patch. Loot works pretty much exactly like it did in the legacy client, but we've rethought club functionality and given it its own tab in the Social tab's sub-nav.

replies.body:
*Fake internet money* was more of a joke that's been around on the net for a long time. RP stands for Riot Points, which is a currency used to purchase skins, champions, ward skins, and other account services and digital goods within the store in the client. RP can be purchased with real money and be used towards purchasing those items in the store.

The *legacy client* is the normal one you played League on before getting accepted into the Alpha Client. Basically the messaging was just letting testers know that if they want to stock up on RP, they'll have to do so in the current Live (legacy) client before heading back into the Alpha Client to make purchases.

I hope that cleared this up. Let me know if you have any questions.

P.S. Your level on the boards has been updated, so you should have no issues posting on the boards anymore.
